You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Predictions for Carbon Emission from Supply Chain Activities

Create an app by using the Prediction of Supply Chain Emissions template to get predictions about carbon emissions from your company’s supply chain activities. Embed the Predicted Supply Chain Emissions dashboard on the Home page to view the predictions of the supply chain emissions. Reduce your company's carbon emissions by analyzing the predictions of the supply chain emissions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience and the Salesforce mobile app
Available in: Enterprise, Developer, Performance, and Unlimited Editions
Available with the CRM Analytics for Net Zero add-on license

External data with your company’s growth factors and USEEIO categories and the corresponding growth factors is required to get the predictions. You can sync this external data to CRM Analytics by uploading CSV files containing the required details or by configuring a remote connection. If you configure a remote connection to sync external data, create an app to generate CRM Analytics datasets with the synced external data, by using the External Data to Predict Supply Chain Emissions template.

Enable CRM Analytics and Assign Permissions
Enable CRM Analytics and assign the required permissions to admins and users. Set field-level security for the fields that are used by the CRM Analytics apps created by using the External Data to Predict Supply Chain Emissions template and the Prediction of Supply Chain Emissions template.
Prepare Internal and External Data
Sync objects locally or connect to remote data outside of Salesforce to prepare the input data.
Create an App to Predict Carbon Emissions from Supply Chain Activities
Create an app by using the Prediction of Supply Chain Emissions template to get the prediction of supply chain emissions for a future year. The predictions are based on scope 3 procurement items, procurement emissions factor set items, your company’s growth factors, and USEEIO categories and the corresponding company growth factors.
Generated Recipe and Dataset
The app created by using the Prediction of Supply Chain Emissions template creates the Predicted Supply Chain Emissions Dataset recipe.
Predicted Supply Chain Emissions Dashboard
Show interactive visualizations of predicted carbon emissions from supply chain activities, by adding the Predicted Supply Chain Emissions dashboard to the Home page.

title: Net Zero Cloud Configuration and Carbon Emission Prediction
